Valverde: "Quan es perd sempre es mira l'entrenador, és així i ho assumeixo"
El tècnic blaugrana admet que no van estar bé contra el Llevant i que han de "millorar"

04 Nov 2019, 15:26

Ernesto Valverde ha atès els mitjans abans del partit de Lliga de Campions d'aquest dimarts entre el Barça i l'Slavia de Praga al Camp Nou (18.55 h, Movistar Liga de Campeones). "Ens imaginem un partit semblant al de l'anada i al que van jugar fora de casa contra l'Inter de Milà. Serà un partit amb un gran desgast físic, en què buscaran moltes arribades a la porteria rival", ha valorat l'entrenador blaugrana.
Valverde ha afirmat que la lesió de Luis Suárez al soli de la cama dreta no és com la que va patir tot just a l'inici de la temporada. "No és una lesió greu. És complicat que hi sigui contra l'Slavia. Al cap de setmana, ja veurem". 
Pel que fa als problemes de l'equip, amb una arrencada fluixa a domicili, Valverde ha admès que no han estat gaire bé aquest començament de temporada lluny del Camp Nou, però que van reaccionar amb tres victòries seguides a domicili (Getafe, Eibar i Slavia). "Contra el Llevant hem tornat a perdre, en un partit que havíem tingut controlat. Em centro a analitzar els aspectes futbolístics, no els psicològics".
El tècnic extremeny ha assumit que, quan es perd, "a qui es mira primer sempre és a l'entrenador", i ha admès que contra el Llevant no van estar bé i no van tenir la pilota tant com voldrien: "Hem de millorar".



Valverde ha tornat a parlar del principal mal del Barça, els partits a domicili: "Vam començar malament fora de casa i hem tornat a perdre, però això no vol dir que hàgim de tornar a perdre. Esperem que la derrota contra el Llevant sigui només una pedra més en el camí". Preguntant per si hi ha falta de lideratge quan l'equip va perdent, l'entrenador blaugrana ha contraargumentat recordant remuntades com les dels partits amb l'Inter i el Betis al Camp Nou. 
Valverde ha admès que després d'una derrota tenen més pressió, però que confia en la reacció de l'equip contra l'Slavia de Praga i en el fet que el Barça ja hi està habituat. Respecte a les correccions que el tècnic demana, ha afirmat que no es tracta de correccions individuals –"perquè d'errors individuals sempre n'hi pot haver"–, sinó grupals: "Hem de treballar en grup per dur la pilota al davant, on tenim molt bons davanters que no acostumen a fallar. Però, esclar, hem de poder arribar a dalt i crear perill".
"A Riqui Puig li va bé formar-se al filial"
Un dia després que el migcampista del filial, Riqui Puig, afirmés que si no té minuts amb el primer equip no tanca la porta a sortir del Barça, Ernesto Valverde l'ha elogiat afirmant que "és un talent", però també ha recordat "l’àmplia nòmina de migcampistes que ja té al primer equip. "Tenim molta gent al mig del camp i això, en certa mesura, és un problema perquè no hi ha lloc per a tots. Acabarà jugant al Barça, però ara s’està formant al filial, que és un lloc on li va bé fer-ho", ha dit el tècnic, que ha resolt afirmant "són qüestions internes" una possible sortida de Puig al gener.

Valverde: "When you lose you always look at the coach, that's the way and I assume it"
The Blaugrana coach admits that they were not well against Levante and that they have to "improve"

04 Nov 2019, 15:26

Ernesto Valverde has attended the media before the Champions League match on Tuesday between Barça and Slavia from Prague at the Camp Nou (18.55, Movistar Champions League). "We imagined a match similar to that of the first leg and that they played away from home against Inter Milan. It will be a game with a great physical exhaustion, in which they will seek many goals at the rival goal" Barça coach.
Valverde said that the injury of Luis Suárez to the sole of the right leg is not like the one that suffered just at the beginning of the season. "It's not a serious injury. It's hard to be against Slavia. At weekends, we'll see."
Regarding the problems of the team, with a steady start at home, Valverde admitted that they were not very well this start of the season away from the Camp Nou, but they reacted with three straight victories at home (Getafe, Eibar and Slavia). "Against the Levante we have lost again, in a game that we had controlled. I focus on analyzing the soccer aspects, not the psychological ones."
The Extremadian coach has assumed that, when he loses, "who looks first is always the coach," and he admitted that against Levante they did not go well and did not have the ball as much as they would like: "We have to improve ".



Valverde spoke again about Barça's main mischief, the home games: "We started badly out of the house and we lost again, but that does not mean we have to lose again. We hope that defeat against Levante is only one more stone on the way ". Asking if there is a lack of leadership when the team is losing, Barça coaches have counter-attacked by rememers such as those of matches with Inter and Betis at the Camp Nou.
Valverde admitted that after a defeat they have more pressure, but he trusts in the reaction of the team against Slavia in Prague and in the fact that Barça is already accustomed to it. Regarding the corrections requested by the technician, he said that it is not a question of individual corrections - "because of individual errors there may always be" -, but groups: "We have to work in groups to bring the ball forward, where we have very good strikers who do not usually fail. But, to clarify, we must be able to get up and create danger. "
"Riqui Puig is going well to train the subsidiary"
A day after the midfielder of the subsidiary, Riqui Puig, stated that if he does not have minutes with the first team, he does not close the door for Barça, Ernesto Valverde praised her saying "it's a talent," but he also recalled " the wide list of midfielder who already has the first team. "We have a lot of people in the middle of the field and that, to some extent, is a problem because there is no place for everyone. He will finish playing Barça, but now he is training his subsidiary, which is a good place to do so, "said the technician, who resolved affirming" they are internal questions "a possible exit from Puig in January.
